widget.label: Social Commerce Pinboard
widget.description: A responsive pinboard showcasing customer-submitted Checkout Comments in a unique product-centered browsing experience.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.label: Product Box Limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of product boxes to be displayed on page load. The remaining product boxes will be loaded in batches equal to the limit

parameter.name: max_days_old
parameter.label: Max Comment Age
parameter.description: The maximum days old a comment can be and still appear in the product box. A value of -1 specifies means all comments should be included, regardless of age

parameter.name: max_comments_per_box
parameter.label: Max # of Comments Per Box
parameter.description: The maximum number of comments that should be displayed in each product box

parameter.name: progressive_loading
parameter.label: Enable Progressive Loading
parameter.description: When set to 'Yes' any remaining available content beyond the set limit will load once the user gets to the bottom of the page. If set to ‘No’ a ‘load more’ button will display instead

parameter.name: cache_lifetime
parameter.label: Cache Lifetime (Seconds)
parameter.description: To refresh instantly, clear the Blocks HTML Output cache.

parameter.name: condition
parameter.label: Conditions
parameter.description: Select the products to be displayed in the pinboard.
